item.description: In 2010, the UCLA mathematics department launched a scholarship opportunity for entering freshman students with exceptional background and promise in mathematics. This program was unfortunately suspen...
item.content:encoded: In 2010, the UCLA mathematics department launched a scholarship opportunity for entering freshman students with exceptional background and promise in mathematics. This program was unfortunately suspended for a while due to technical reasons, but we are once again able to offer one scholarship each year. The UCLA Math Undergraduate Merit Scholarship provides for full tuition, [‚Ä¶]

item.title: The Ultimate Guide To Different Word Embedding Techniques In NLP | KDnuggets
item.description: A machine can only understand numbers. As a result, converting text to numbers, called embedding text, is an actively researched topic. In this article, we review different word embedding techniques f...
item.content:encoded: A machine can only understand numbers. As a result, converting text to numbers, called embedding text, is an actively researched topic. In this article, we review different word embedding techniques for converting text into vectors.

item.title: Attend the Data Science Symposium 2022, November 8 in Cincinnati | KDnuggets
item.description: The Center for Business Analytics at the University of Cincinnati will present its annual Data Science Symposium 2022 on November 8. This all day in-person event will have three featured speakers and ...
item.content:encoded: The Center for Business Analytics at the University of Cincinnati will present its annual Data Science Symposium 2022 on November 8. This all day in-person event will have three featured speakers and two tech talk tracks with four concurrent presentations in each track. The event, held at the Lindner College of Business, is open to all.

These interactions have unique characteristics that set them apart from other forms of dialogue, yet are not available when learners practice alone at home. In the field of natura...
